verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> left,<WH5117> to prove<WH5254> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> by them, even<WH853> as many<WH3605> <WH834> of Israel as had not<WH3808> known<WH3045> <WH853> all<WH3605> the wars<WH4421> of Canaan;<WH3667>

Only <WH7535> that<WH4616> the generations<WH1755> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> might know,<WH3045> to teach<WH3925> them war,<WH4421> at the least<WH7535> such as<WH834> before<WH6440> knew<WH3045> nothing<WH3808> thereof;

Namely, five<WH2568> lords<WH5633> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and all<WH3605> the Canaanites,<WH3669> and the Sidonians,<WH6722> and the Hivites<WH2340> that dwelt<WH3427> in mount<WH2022> Lebanon,<WH3844> from mount<WH4480> <WH2022> Baal-hermon<WH1179> unto<WH5704> the entering in<WH935> of Hamath.<WH2574>

And they were<WH1961> to prove<WH5254> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> by them, to know<WH3045> whether they would hearken<WH8085> unto<WH853> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> <WH853> their fathers<WH1> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses.<WH4872>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Canaanites,<WH3669> Hittites,<WH2850> and Amorites,<WH567> and Perizzites,<WH6522> and Hivites,<WH2340> and Jebusites: <WH2983>
And they took<WH3947> <WH853> their daughters<WH1323> to be their wives,<WH802> and gave<WH5414> their daughters<WH1323> to their sons,<WH1121> and served<WH5647> <WH853> their gods.<WH430>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> <WH853> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> and forgot<WH7911> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and served<WH5647> <WH853> Baalim<WH1168> and the groves.<WH842>

Therefore the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was hot<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and he sold<WH4376> them into the hand<WH3027> of Cushan-rishathaim<WH3573> king<WH4428> of Mesopotamia:<WH763> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> served<WH5647> <WH853> Cushan-rishathaim<WH3573> eight<WH8083> years.<WH8141>

And when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> the LORD<WH3068> raised up<WH6965> a deliverer<WH3467> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> who delivered<WH3467> them, even<WH853> Othniel<WH6274> the son<WH1121> of Kenaz,<WH7073> Caleb's<WH3612> younger<WH6996> brother.<WH251>

And the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> upon<WH5921> him, and he judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> and went out<WH3318> to war:<WH4421> and the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> <WH853> Cushan-rishathaim<WH3573> king<WH4428> of Mesopotamia<WH763> into his hand;<WH3027> and his hand<WH3027> prevailed<WH5810> against<WH5921> Cushan-rishathaim.<WH3573>
And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> forty<WH705> years.<WH8141> And Othniel<WH6274> the son<WH1121> of Kenaz<WH7073> died.<WH4191>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> again<WH3254> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD:<WH3068> and the LORD<WH3068> strengthened<WH2388> <WH853> Eglon<WH5700> the king<WH4428> of Moab<WH4124> against<WH5921> Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> <WH3588> they had done<WH6213> <WH853> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And he gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> him<WH853> the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> and Amalek,<WH6002> and went<WH1980> and smote<WH5221> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> and possessed<WH3423> <WH853> the city<WH5892> of palm trees.<WH8558>
So the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> served<WH5647> <WH853> Eglon<WH5700> the king<WH4428> of Moab<WH4124> eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240> years.<WH8141>

But when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> the LORD<WH3068> raised them up<WH6965> a deliverer,<WH3467> <WH853> Ehud<WH261> the son<WH1121> of Gera,<WH1617> a Benjamite,<WH1121> <WH1145> a man<WH376> left-handed:<WH334> <WH3027> <WH3225> and by him<WH3027> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> sent<WH7971> a present<WH4503> unto Eglon<WH5700> the king<WH4428> of Moab.<WH4124>

But Ehud<WH261> made<WH6213> him a dagger<WH2719> which had two<WH8147> edges,<WH6366> of a cubit<WH1574> length;<WH753> and he did gird<WH2296> it under<WH4480> <WH8478> his raiment<WH4055> upon<WH5921> his right<WH3225> thigh.<WH3409>
And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the present<WH4503> unto Eglon<WH5700> king<WH4428> of Moab:<WH4124> and Eglon<WH5700> was a very<WH3966> fat<WH1277> man.<WH376>
And when<WH834> he had made an end<WH3615> to offer<WH7126> <WH853> the present,<WH4503> he sent away<WH7971> <WH853> the people<WH5971> that bore<WH5375> the present.<WH4503>

But he<WH1931> himself turned again<WH7725> from<WH4480> the quarries<WH6456> that<WH834> were by<WH854> Gilgal,<WH1537> and said,<WH559> I have a secret<WH5643> errand<WH1697> unto thee, O king:<WH4428> who said,<WH559> Keep silence.<WH2013> And all<WH3605> that stood<WH5975> by him went out<WH3318> from<WH4480> <WH5921> him.

And Ehud<WH261> came<WH935> unto<WH413> him; and he<WH1931> was sitting<WH3427> in a summer<WH4747> parlor,<WH5944> which<WH834> he had for himself alone.<WH905> And Ehud<WH261> said,<WH559> I have a message<WH1697> from God<WH430> unto<WH413> thee. And he arose<WH6965> out of<WH4480> <WH5921> his seat.<WH3678>

And Ehud<WH261> put forth<WH7971> <WH853> his left<WH8040> hand,<WH3027> and took<WH3947> <WH853> the dagger<WH2719> from<WH4480> <WH5921> his right<WH3225> thigh,<WH3409> and thrust<WH8628> it into his belly: <WH990>

And the haft<WH5325> also<WH1571> went in<WH935> after<WH310> the blade;<WH3851> and the fat<WH2459> closed<WH5462> upon<WH1157> the blade,<WH3851> so that<WH3588> he could not<WH3808> draw<WH8025> the dagger<WH2719> out of his belly;<WH4480> <WH990> and the dirt<WH6574> came out.<WH3318>
Then Ehud<WH261> went forth<WH3318> through the porch,<WH4528> and shut<WH5462> the doors<WH1817> of the parlor<WH5944> upon him,<WH1157> and locked<WH5274> them.

When he<WH1931> was gone out,<WH3318> his servants<WH5650> came;<WH935> and when they saw<WH7200> that, behold,<WH2009> the doors<WH1817> of the parlor<WH5944> were locked,<WH5274> they said,<WH559> Surely<WH389> he<WH1931> covereth<WH5526> <WH853> his feet<WH7272> in his summer<WH4747> chamber.<WH2315>

And they tarried<WH2342> till<WH5704> they were ashamed:<WH954> and, behold,<WH2009> he opened<WH6605> not<WH369> the doors<WH1817> of the parlor;<WH5944> therefore they took<WH3947> <WH853> a key,<WH4668> and opened<WH6605> them: and, behold,<WH2009> their lord<WH113> was fallen down<WH5307> dead<WH4191> on the earth.<WH776>
And Ehud<WH261> escaped<WH4422> while<WH5704> they tarried,<WH4102> and passed beyond<WH5674> <WH853> the quarries,<WH6456> and escaped<WH4422> unto Seirath.<WH8167>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when he was come,<WH935> that he blew<WH8628> a trumpet<WH7782> in the mountain<WH2022> of Ephraim,<WH669> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went down<WH3381> with<WH5973> him from<WH4480> the mount,<WH2022> and he<WH1931> before<WH6440> them.

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Follow<WH7291> after<WH310> me: for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath delivered<WH5414> <WH853> your enemies<WH341> <WH853> the Moabites<WH4124> into your hand.<WH3027> And they went down<WH3381> after<WH310> him, and took<WH3920> <WH853> the fords<WH4569> of Jordan<WH3383> toward Moab,<WH4124> and suffered<WH5414> not<WH3808> a man<WH376> to pass over.<WH5674>

And they slew<WH5221> of<WH853> Moab<WH4124> at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> about ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> men,<WH376> all<WH3605> lusty,<WH8082> and all<WH3605> men<WH376> of valor;<WH2428> and there escaped<WH4422> not<WH3808> a man.<WH376>
So Moab<WH4124> was subdued<WH3665> that<WH1931> day<WH3117> under<WH8478> the hand<WH3027> of Israel.<WH3478> And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> fourscore<WH8084> years.<WH8141>

And after<WH310> him was<WH1961> Shamgar<WH8044> the son<WH1121> of Anath,<WH6067> which slew<WH5221> of<WH853> the Philistines<WH6430> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> with an ox<WH1241> goad:<WH4451> and he<WH1931> also<WH1571> delivered<WH3467> <WH853> Israel.<WH3478>
